name: core-decorators
description: Library of JavaScript stage-0 decorators (aka ES2016/ES7 decorators but that's not accurate!) inspired by languages that come with built-ins like @​override, @​deprecate, @​autobind, @​mixin and more! Works great with React/Angular/more!

0.17.0.name: core-decorators
0.17.0.description: Library of JavaScript stage-0 decorators (aka ES2016/ES7 decorators but that's not accurate!) inspired by languages that come with built-ins like @​override, @​deprecate, @​autobind, @​mixin and more! Works great with React/Angular/more!

0.18.0.name: core-decorators
0.18.0.description: Library of JavaScript stage-0 decorators (aka ES2016/ES7 decorators but that's not accurate!) inspired by languages that come with built-ins like @​override, @​deprecate, @​autobind, @​mixin and more! Works great with React/Angular/more!

scripts.test: npm run build && mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill "test/**/*.spec.js"

0.19.0.name: core-decorators
0.19.0.description: Library of JavaScript stage-0 decorators (aka ES2016/ES7 decorators but that's not accurate!) inspired by languages that come with built-ins like @​override, @​deprecate, @​autobind, @​mixin and more! Works great with React/Angular/more!

scripts.build: babel --out-dir lib src && BABEL_ENV=es babel --out-dir es src
scripts.test: npm run build && mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill "test/**/*.spec.js"

0.20.0.name: core-decorators
0.20.0.description: Library of JavaScript stage-0 decorators (aka ES2016/ES7 decorators but that's not accurate!) inspired by languages that come with built-ins like @​override, @​deprecate, @​autobind, @​mixin and more! Works great with React/Angular/more!

scripts.build: rimraf lib && babel --out-dir lib src && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel --out-dir es src
scripts.test: mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill "test/**/*.spec.js"
